supplementary-material.label: FIG S5
supplementary-material.p: Shannon diversity scores for each time point for the pilin glycosylation module. The genes in this module and method for calculation of expression score is indicated in Fig. 5. The diversity was calculated as described for Fig. S3. Download FIG S5, PDF file, 0.1 MB.
